channel.title: Pages on Cheng Music
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Cheng Music

item.title: About me
item.description: Hello. I’m Cheng. I’ve been doing music in my spare time just for fun for more than 6 years. Some of my works are posted here so you can have a look. Most of the tracks are for game and they are in EDM music (for high-tech themed games) Horror music (for some ghost-chasing games) Ambient music (for some sightseeing games, but mainly for the game credit scene) Chilli music (for some calm games) Hope you like my music (and me as well).
